query:
INSERT INTO recharges (customerId, amount, paymentMethod, status, transactionId, completedAt, createdAt, updatedAt)
SELECT 
  customerId,
  amount,
  'pix' as paymentMethod,
  'completed' as status,
  txid as transactionId,
  paidAt as completedAt,
  createdAt,
  NOW() as updatedAt
FROM pix_transactions 
WHERE customerId = (SELECT id FROM customers WHERE pin = 7) 
  AND amount = 233
  AND status = 'paid'
  AND txid NOT IN (SELECT transactionId FROM recharges WHERE transactionId IS NOT NULL)

  customerId,
  amount,
  'pix' as paymentMethod,
  'completed' as status,
  txid as transactionId,
  paidAt as completedAt,
  createdAt,
  NOW() as updatedAt
FROM pix_transactions 
WHERE customerId = (SELECT id FROM customers WHERE pin = 7) 
  AND amount = 233
  AND status = 'paid'
  AND txid NOT IN (SELECT transactionId FROM recharges WHERE transactionId IS NOT NULL)
